# Scrapy 0.25 文档

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/scrapy-0-25-wendang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/scrapy-0-25-wendang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install scrapy-0-25-wendang
scrapy-0-25-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g scrapy-0-erwu-wendang
scrapy-0-erwu-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
